verses.text: \w May|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* Lord give ear \w to|strong="H1732"\w* you \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* day \w of|strong="H1732"\w* trouble; \w may|strong="H1732"\w* you \w be|strong="H1732"\w* placed on high \w by|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* name \w of|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* God \w of|strong="H1732"\w* Jacob;

\w May|strong="H0430"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* send \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w help|strong="H6030"\w* \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* holy place, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H6030"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* strength \w from|strong="H3117"\w* Zion;

May \w he|strong="H7971"\w* keep all \w your|strong="H7971"\w* offerings \w in|strong="H7971"\w* mind, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w be|strong="H6726"\w* pleased \w with|strong="H6726"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* fat \w of|strong="H6944"\w* \w your|strong="H7971"\w* burned offerings; (Selah.)

\w May|strong="H2142"\w* \w he|strong="H4503"\w* give \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* heart's desire, \w and|strong="H4503"\w* \w put|strong="H2142"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* purposes into effect.

\w We|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* glad \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* salvation, \w and|strong="H3824"\w* \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* name \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w we|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* flags: \w may|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* requests.

Now \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* certain \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w gives|strong="H3444"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* king; \w he|strong="H0430"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* give \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w an|strong="H3068"\w* answer \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* holy heaven \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* strength \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* right hand.

Some put \w their|strong="H3068"\w* faith \w in|strong="H3068"\w* carriages \w and|strong="H3068"\w* some \w in|strong="H3068"\w* horses; \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w strong|strong="H1369"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* name \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H0428"\w* bent \w down|strong="H0428"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* made low; \w but|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H0587"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H2142"\w* lifted up.

\w Come|strong="H5307"\w* \w to|strong="H6965"\w* \w our|strong="H5307"\w* \w help|strong="H6965"\w*, Lord: let \w the|strong="H6965"\w* king \w give|strong="H5307"\w* ear \w to|strong="H6965"\w* \w our|strong="H5307"\w* cry.
